message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to sell you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start with a price of $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but $100 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this point. Would you be willing to go down to $90?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can do $95, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that.
